ByteMatchSetId.description: The ByteMatchSetId of the ByteMatchSet that you want to update. ByteMatchSetId is returned by CreateByteMatchSet and by ListByteMatchSets.

ChangeToken.description: The value returned by the most recent call to GetChangeToken.

Updates.description: An array of ByteMatchSetUpdate objects that you want to insert into or delete from a ByteMatchSet. For more information, see the applicable data types:    ByteMatchSetUpdate: Contains Action and ByteMatchTuple     ByteMatchTuple: Contains FieldToMatch, PositionalConstraint, TargetString, and TextTransformation     FieldToMatch: Contains Data and Type
